description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter screen (TransactionsScreen) and a subcomponent (_TransactionForm) for displaying and managing transaction data in a budget tracking application. It includes UI elements for filters, adding new transactions, and listing existing transactions.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of transactions with filtering options and a button to add new transactions.

classes.name: _TransactionsScreenState
classes.description: State class for TransactionsScreen that manages filtering state and UI.

classes.name: _TransactionForm
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a form for creating a new transaction.

classes.name: _TransactionFormState
classes.description: State class for _TransactionForm that manages form inputs and submission logic.

methods.name: _openAddForm
methods.description: Opens a modal bottom sheet with the transaction form to add a new transaction.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the transactions screen, including filters, list view, and add button.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Presents a date picker for selecting a transaction date.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Validates and submits the new transaction form, adding the transaction via provider.
